I didn't know whether to post this in the entertainment or fun thread so I decide to just post it here.
 
 I just finished watching the movie K-Pax last night with a few of my friends and I really enjoyed the movie but it does leave a really open question at the end of it. Was Prot an alien or a deranged human? After debating with my friends for a little while it seems they decided he was just a human and I was the only one who believed he was an alien. So I decide to find out what people here thought. Also if you haven't seen the movie, you should check it out. It is very good!

I'm pretty sure its based on a true story. I had a website for the guys life at one time but lost it.
 "Deranged Human" is one thing to call it.
 
 Always Stay Open Minded

I don't know about that being based on a true story... If it was based on a true story it was probably very loosly based considering some of the stuff he was capable of (could see ultra violet which is impossible for human eyes).

Of course alot of things were exagerrated.
 or else they couldn't have a movie for you take me this thread on.
 
 
 Always Stay Open Minded
